content:
Foot Anstey LLP is a limited liability partnership registered in England and Wales (registered no. OC360255). Registered office: Salt Quay House, 4 North East Quay, Sutton Harbour, Plymouth, PL4 0BN. It is a licensed body (ABS) authorised and regulated by the Solicitors Regulation Authority (SRA authorisation no. 558012). The term ‘Partner’ refers to a member of Foot Anstey LLP. A list of members is open to inspection at our registered office. Foot Anstey LLP, The Quad, Blackbrook Park Avenue, Blackbrook Business Park, Taunton, TA1 2PX Tel: +44 (0)1823 625600   Fax: +44 (0)1823 625678   DX: 97177 TAUNTON BLACKBROOK  WORKSITE: 40434878/1  Eveele Limited 101 Grosvenor Crescent Uxbridge UB10 9EU  Our Ref:   ao3/ao3/241849/145  Your Ref:  Date:   9 April 2021  When calling please ask for:   Anri Oosthuizen  e-mail:   ao3@footanstey.com  Direct Line:   +44 1823 625977  Direct Fax:   +44 1823 625678  Dear Sirs  Purchase of:   34 Fairfield Road, Uxbridge , UB8 1AL  Please find enclosed for your attention our Report on Title in relation to the above property together with the various enclosures referred to. These include title information, copy searches and ancillary documents relevant to your transaction. Please may you also assist at this stage with the following:- 1.   Contract.   Please find enclosed the Contract relating to your purchase. Please sign where indicated. Please do not date or alter this document in any way. We will do so on exchange. Your signature to this document does not need to be witnessed. 2.   Transfer Deed.   Please find enclosed the Transfer Deed for your attention. Please may I ask you to sign where indicated in the presence of an independent adult who should also provide their signature, name and address where stated? Again, please do not date this deed. 3.   Legal Charge.   Please sign this Deed as Director of your Company at the bottom of the second page. Please again arrange for your signature to be witnessed by an independent adult who should also provide their signature, name and address where indicated beneath your signature. Again, please do not date this deed. 4.   Company Resolution.   Please find enclosed the Company Resolution required by West Brom. You will see that this is required in order to confirm that the execution of the Legal Charge is in the best interests of the Company and all requirements regarding interested Directors (if applicable) were addressed and complied with in accordance with the Articles of Association of the Company and the Companies Acts. Please add the date of the Meeting of Directors, the name of the Chairman of the meeting and sign where indicated as Director of the Company. 5.   Completion Statement.   I attach a completion statement for your information, to ensure all funds are received by us before completion. 6.   Mortgage Conditions Confirmation.   West Brom require us to hold written confirmation from you prior to completion that all Representations and Warranties contained in clause 5 of the Commercial Mortgage Conditions 2018 are true and correct. Please may you provide us with
2  WORKSITE: 40434878/1  this confirmation, either in writing or by email? Please let us know if you require a further copy of the Commercial Mortgage Conditions 2018. Please return all original signed documents to us as soon as possible.   In readiness for exchange of contracts, please would you also let us have your deposit monies (10% of purchase price)?   In order to save time we would suggest it is safer to send funds to us electronically. Please note that our bank details are:- Bank: Lloyds Bank PLC Branch Address: PO Box 128 Royal Parade, Plymouth PL1 1LX Sort Code: 30-96-68 Account Number: 00229137 Foot Anstey Client Account Reference: 241849/145  FRAUD PREVENTION: Please do not pay any monies to any other account other than the account   details   we   have   provided   you.   These   have   not   changed   since   the   start   of   this transaction. Please be aware that fraudsters will sometimes impersonate law firms, by phone, email or letter. Please call us immediately if you receive contact apparently from us telling you to pay money into any account other than this one. For the avoidance of doubt we will never contact you advising that our account details have changed.  If you have any queries at all on any of the above or the documents enclosed, please do not hesitate to contact me. I enclose a pre-paid envelope for your use. Yours faithfully Foot Anstey LLP
